result.execSummary:
The defendant Blaine Edward Wheaton was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Blaine Edward Wheaton is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Blaine Edward Wheaton was found guilty of Manufacture/Deliver THC (>2500-10,000g) [Modifiers: Second and Subsequent Offense], a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(h)4.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Must complete any Mental Health assessment, treatment, counseling deemed necessary.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Blaine Edward Wheaton
